choices: StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm
StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void
1.content:
you are by chance falling on your last tour in the center of Brest near the Freedom Square, on a bizarre shop, named "Koprulu sector terran importer" at the window and door worthy of a spacecraft, curious you entered, only present in the said shop which from the inside seemed as vast as a cathedral a weird seller

a 22-year-old guy dressed in a sci fi black jumpsuit, in the shop filled with all sorts of objects straight out of the starcraft games ranging from mar-sara bar's beer mug and marchall raynor's plate. the complete CMC armor going through the crystals and barrel of vespene gas

not to mention a costume section of all the characters in the game, including terrans, protos and zerg.


living far enough and having come on foot you could only carry one or more small items in your backpack, also going to the counter behind which, waiting for you the seller you finally see a small radius, including comic book comic that could be done around the universe Starcraft, as well as a good place the video games

The prices of the store being incredibly affordable, you buy the complete assortment of video games and all their DLC.

.....

later back home, you put yourself in front of your computer and install one of your new Starcraft video games, it settles at the speed of lightning and when you start it an unknown button appeared in the main menu and you have never seen mention on the net or during your previous games at your friends.

Curiously you click on the said button, and you end up with a first-person view in a ship room in front of you a mirror or you can see yourself in full (you're not an avatar) with screens around with option menu .

_ but a question, what Starcraft game did you start: {/ b}

(This will determine what time of the history of the Koprulu sector you will find yourself, and therefore the choice of characters that you can embody, example impossible to have Tychus findlay in starcraft and starcraft brood war it only appears in Wing of liberty, but once your character appears, you can have it in a later game, even if it does not appear anymore ^^)
1.title: choice your starcraft video game

13.content:
the graphics of the room are so well done that you really feel like you are so much the result is beyond all that the latest virtual reality glasses could bring.

taking a moment to appreciate the quality of the room and mirror reflecting you as you are in the real world, next to the mirror the first screen offers you a first option menu

Choice your side :

Terran :

- Dominion

- rebels


Protos


Zerg
13.title: StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty

choices: create your original caracther ( fill in the form )
132.content:
Once you have pressed the faction of the Terran rebels, the room's decor changed from the ship's room to a dusty cantina in the desert and you immediately recognize the decor of Mar-sara's bar.

In one corner the jukbox kills his music, but by you there is no one in the bar by the bartender behind the counter who is waving you to approach

currently you are back at the front door of the bar, approaching the bartender he points you to a stool at the counter, or in front of you is a mirror reflecting you and in front of you the bartender slips a sheet with a pencil, the sheet is a very detailed identity form to fill out

.... you realize with some trepidation, that you are REELEMENT in the game can feel the whole environment of the bar around you until the air flow, and the certain discomfort of the stool on which you are sitting forearm resting on the countertop wood.

next to the sheet a notebook presenting the rebels one per page with a photo in the foot and the name below with a checkbox

the title of the notebook "incarnate one of the heroes and characters secondary to the rebellion terran" a small note indicating that you must do this check the box under the character of your choice.

Now sit at the counter with the pencil in your hand.

Fill out the form: Create an original character

_ choose in the notebook to embody a character from the terran rebellion.
132.title: terran rebel

info.brief_description: take a break from the war against the dominion, hentai / yaoi in starcraft universe
info.description:
not really a story except this part of the Starcraft universe and its characters

the goal here and have a good time with the characters of the universe of starcraft or your own O.C in the said universe.

_ sex allowed within the regulation of Writing.com

_ hetero / gay romance ok

_ wish you have a relationship between a terran and a zerg no problem having fun

_ no gore please

_ unbirth and vore are allowed, but only if they are soft, and do not lead to the death of the character, (the latter will remain alive, inside his predator, and will always have the opportunity to go out thank you)
